item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

...617 877 1808

LATIN Night -- Friday August 13, 2010 -- 8:00 p.m.

SALSA DANCE LESSONS 8:00 PM - 9:00 PM. ($10.00 includes cover)

Come and enjoy the summer OUTDOORS in our SPACIOUS, NICELY LANDSCAPE PATIO dance to Salsa, Merengue, Reggaeton and more…………….

OUTDOOR POOL TABLES, BEER PONG, DARTS, BARBECUE and DANCING
till 1:30 AM underneath the STARS.

GREAT DJ that will be mixing their Latin beat all night long.

The LOUNGE is also open if you decide to go inside for A/C.

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Premium Liquor
• BARBECUE
• OUT DOOR POOL TABLES
• BEER PONG
• DARTS
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: LATIN NIGHT for the LGBT
